√ric 'leave'

present: [7.] riṅákti etc.  riṅkte   -- rícyate etc.  rícyati  

perfect: riréca  riricé etc.  riricyāt etc.  ririkvā́ṅs  arirecīt  

aorist: [1.] riktam?  areci   -- [2.] aricat   -- [3.] arīricat etc.   -- [4.] ā́raik  arikṣi etc.  

future: [1.] rekṣyate   -- [2.] rektā  

verbal: riktá V.+  ríkta  

secondary: passive: ricyáte etc. V.+   -- intensive: reric-   -- desiderative: ririkṣa-   -- causative: recayati etc. B.+  

derivatives: -reka V.+  -rekin C.  reca B.+  recaka E.+  -recya C.  récana V.+  -recanīya C.  -riñca E.+  -riñcya C.  -riñci E.+  réku RV.  -rikti JB.  rikthá V.+  rékṇas RV.  -ríkvan RV.  

The accent rícyate is quotable only from TS., and ricyáte only from ÇB.
